subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: After his win over Jiri Vesely, Ward, who had not won more than one match at this event in his home country since 2007, said maybe now people could get off his back.
snippet: After his win over Jiri Vesely, Ward, who had not won more than one match at this event in his home country since 2007, said maybe now people could get off his back.
